mapper.select: select * from cn_notebook where cn_user_id=#{userId} order by cn_notebook_createtime desc
mapper.insert: insert into cn_notebook( cn_notebook_id, cn_user_id, cn_notebook_type_id, cn_notebook_name, cn_notebook_createtime ) values( #{cn_notebook_id}, #{cn_user_id}, #{cn_notebook_type_id}, #{cn_notebook_name}, #{cn_notebook_createtime} )
mapper.update: update cn_notebook set cn_notebook_name=#{name} where cn_notebook_id=#{bookId}
mapper.delete: delete from cn_note where cn_notebook_id = #{bookId}; delete from cn_notebook where cn_notebook_id = #{bookId}
